effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Reduces the foe's
ATTACK.

Reduces the foe's
ATTACK.

Growls cutely to reduce the
foe’s ATTACK.

Growls cutely to reduce the
foe’s ATTACK.

The user growls in
a cute way, making
the foe lower its
ATTACK stat.

The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.

Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi
pour tromper la vigilance de l’ennemi
et baisser son Attaque.

The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

かわいい　なきごえを　きかせて
きを　ひき　ゆだんを　させて
あいての　こうげきを　さげる。

귀여운 울음소리를 들려주고
관심을 끌어 방심한 사이에
상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.

Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi pour tromper la
vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.

Der Anwender nimmt das Ziel für sich ein
und senkt dessen Angriffs-Wert.

Dulce gruñido que reduce el Ataque del
contrincante.

Distrae i nemici intorno con un ruggito potente
e ne riduce l’Attacco.

The user growls in an endearing way,
making opposing Pokémon less wary.
This lowers their Attack stats.

かわいい　なきごえを　聞かせて
気を　ひき　油断を　させて
相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

かわいい　なきごえを　きかせて

귀여운 울음소리를 들려주고
관심을 끌어 방심한 사이에
상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.

發出可愛的叫聲，
誘使對手疏忽大意，
降低對手的攻擊。

Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi pour tromper
la vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.

Der Anwender nimmt das Ziel für sich ein und senkt
dessen Angriffs-Wert.

Distrae i nemici intorno con un ruggito potente

opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their
Attack stat.

かわいい　なきごえを　聞かせて
気を　ひき　油断を　させて
相手の　攻撃を　さげる。

让对手听可爱的叫声，
引开注意力使其疏忽，
从而降低对手的攻击。

la vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.

Der Anwender heult herzzerreißend, um sein Ziel
nachlässig werden zu lassen und dessen Angriffs-Wert
zu senken.
Dulce gruñido que reduce el Ataque del equipo rival.

Distrae i nemici intorno con un tenero ruggito
e ne riduce l’Attacco.
